project_path.JungleBookCrypto: contracts/JUNGLE BOOK CRYPTO Full Smart Contract Security Audit/JungleBookCrypto

findings.title: Owner Privileges
findings.description: The owner has excessive privileges in the BEP20 contract, including the ability to include/exclude from fees, enable/disable swap and liquify, burn, update threshold limit, change burn fee, lock transfer for any address, and change liquidity time.
